title: Where's our Win / Loss count in post-game lobby?
body: There was usually a Win / Loss count in the post-game lobby of any game mode. It seems that the Alpha Client doesn't have this, at least not in the post-game lobby. I thought this was a really nice feature, and hope that they implement it somehow in the client. It's nice to know how many AURFs or ARAMs I've won and lost in total.

replies.body:
Hey Aisakumi,

Thanks for the post!  This is something that is still in our backlog.  Just to be transparent with you, we de-prioritized the work until we had a clearer view on where we wanted to take the post-game user experience.  This is something that we will get to in the future, but it may take a few patches before you see it.

Hope the context helps :)

Super agree, we can see if we got better once in a while not just by playing ranked :D
Beside that, it's a really nice feature :D
